2022 Preakness Stakes Hotels & Accommodations

Stay in the Heart of Baltimore, Maryland. During your 2022 Preakness Stakes experience, enjoy first class accommodations located in the beautiful downtown Baltimore Inner Harbour district. A historic city with so much to see and do, you will find that no matter which hotel you choose, there will always be something to explore just steps from your hotel. Additionally, accommodations offer top-notch hospitality and amenities to ensure you have a comfortable stay in this charming city.
